website_summaries.verdict: Nice collection of white regulation-size lacrosse balls for all types of play.
pros: Each ball is regulation size at 2.5 inches
Set of six balls offered at a pretty good price per ball
Set ships inside a mesh bag that makes it easy to carry the balls wherever needed
Delivers the hardness level you need for durability
cons: Some people will prefer multiple colors of balls in a set

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy balls.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs have not destroyed these. They have shredded everything else.
customer_reviews.author: SteamET

customer_reviews.title: Didn't use for LaCrosse, not for massage either
customer_reviews.text: Actually used this for alternative grips for wieghtlifting to improve grip strength. The ready-made products were too expensive. Drilled a hole in these and used as a grip instead of using a bar. Works great. make sure you get regulation size as there are mini sizes out there.
customer_reviews.author: TFYOV

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted & expected
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. I have seeded one ball in different rooms for easy access - we use them as massage tools to roll out neck & back aches, and even to roll out foot arches. Since this is a set of 6, I was able to give a couple away.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T. H.

customer_reviews.title: great dog chew toys
customer_reviews.text: this is the only thing i have found that takes my dog the longest to chew up.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Rae Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for rolling
customer_reviews.text: They're lacrosse balls. I have 2 for individual rolling and 2 homemade peanuts for some of that sweet double team action. Don't understand the appeal of the sports but they sure make a darn good mashing tool.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Swanson

customer_reviews.title: well priced lacrosse ball option
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed for for physical therapy, these seem to me to be just average lacrosse balls, but they are doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lacrosse Balls
customer_reviews.text: Great for lax practice. Keep their shape even though my some leaves them outside!
customer_reviews.author: Matty88

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Mostly using these as mechanisms for rolling out knots after workouts. As a lacrosse ball, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Derek L.

customer_reviews.title: Price is good, I certainly will purchase form thie retailer again
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as it is described to be. Price is good, I certainly will purchase form thie retailer again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for to roll out on ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to roll out on... no strong odors. What more can I say about a lacrosse ball..
customer_reviews.author: MissT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I use them for self massage. They are very firm.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

product_meta.title: Crown Sporting Goods White Regulation Size Lacrosse Balls in Mesh Storage Bag (Set of 6)
product_meta.description:
Lacrosse balls are one of the more quiet multi-taskers in the world of sports. Sure, these six white balls are ideal training partners for thousands of LAX players the world over-regulation size and weight, hard and durable vulcanized rubber, they even come in a handy mesh storage bag. But many athletes, cross fitters and massage therapists (and dog lovers?) have discovered dozens of other applications.

The solid, vulcanized rubber that makes these balls perfect for outdoor lacrosse practice also makes them perfect massage tools. The superior hardness allows for quick relief when performing myofascial release, or simply rolling them against tight muscle knots and vital trigger points. The vulcanized rubber also makes these balls virtually indestructible, even in the jaws of the biggest dogs who have destroyed even the hardiest of toys.

Whatever your purpose: practice, therapy, or fetch, these lacrosse balls will be up for the challenge.

.
feature_bullets: Six 2.5" regulation size white lacrosse balls
Solid, vulcanized rubber; Excellent hardness rating for outdoor practice
Includes a handy, reusable mesh bag for carrying and storage
Also excellent for massage therapy; Hard rubber works wonders for trigger points, muscle knots and myofascal release in athletes and active bodies
Tired of your big dog destroying tennis balls? Compare these to other rubber dog toys, but at a fraction of the cost

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
